component.name: getSurveyList
component.description: Retrieves a paged list of surveys in a user's account

component.name: getCollectorList
component.description: Retrieves a paged list of collectors for a survey in a user's account

component.name: getRespondentList
component.description: Retrieves a paged list of respondents for a given survey and optionally collector

component.name: getResponses
component.description: Takes a list of respondent ids and returns the responses that correlate to them

component.name: getResponseCounts
component.description: Returns how many respondents have started and/or completed the survey for the given collector
